title: Slack
description: One way to interact with the Slack platform is its HTTP RPC-based Web API, a collection of methods requiring OAuth 2.0-based user, bot, or workspace tokens blessed with related OAuth scopes.

apps_permissions_info.title: Returns list of permissions this app has on a team.
apps_permissions_info.description: Returns list of permissions this app has on a team.

apps_permissions_request.title: Allows an app to request additional scopes
apps_permissions_request.description: Allows an app to request additional scopes

apps_permissions_resources_list.title: Returns list of resource grants this app has on a team.
apps_permissions_resources_list.description: Returns list of resource grants this app has on a team.

apps_permissions_scopes_list.title: Returns list of scopes this app has on a team.
apps_permissions_scopes_list.description: Returns list of scopes this app has on a team.

bots_info.title: Gets information about a bot user.
bots_info.description: Gets information about a bot user.

channels_history.title: Fetches history of messages and events from a channel.
channels_history.description: Fetches history of messages and events from a channel.

channels_invite.title: Invites a user to a channel.
channels_invite.description: Invites a user to a channel.

channels_join.title: Joins a channel, creating it if needed.
channels_join.description: Joins a channel, creating it if needed.

channels_kick.title: Removes a user from a channel.
channels_kick.description: Removes a user from a channel.

channels_list.title: Lists all channels in a Slack team.
channels_list.description: Lists all channels in a Slack team.

channels_mark.title: Sets the read cursor in a channel.
channels_mark.description: Sets the read cursor in a channel.

channels_replies.title: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a channel
channels_replies.description: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a channel

channels_setPurpose.title: Sets the purpose for a channel.
channels_setPurpose.description: Sets the purpose for a channel.

channels_setTopic.title: Sets the topic for a channel.
channels_setTopic.description: Sets the topic for a channel.

chat_getPermalink.title: Retrieve a permalink URL for a specific extant message
chat_getPermalink.description: Retrieve a permalink URL for a specific extant message

chat_meMessage.title: Share a me message into a channel.
chat_meMessage.description: Share a me message into a channel.

chat_postEphemeral.title: Sends an ephemeral message to a user in a channel.
chat_postEphemeral.description: Sends an ephemeral message to a user in a channel.

chat_postMessage.title: Sends a message to a channel.
chat_postMessage.description: Sends a message to a channel.

chat_unfurl.title: Provide custom unfurl behavior for user-posted URLs
chat_unfurl.description: Provide custom unfurl behavior for user-posted URLs

conversations_close.title: Closes a direct message or multi-person direct message.
conversations_close.description: Closes a direct message or multi-person direct message.

conversations_create.title: Initiates a public or private channel-based conversation
conversations_create.description: Initiates a public or private channel-based conversation

conversations_history.title: Fetches a conversation's history of messages and events.
conversations_history.description: Fetches a conversation's history of messages and events.

conversations_kick.title: Removes a user from a conversation.
conversations_kick.description: Removes a user from a conversation.

conversations_list.title: Lists all channels in a Slack team.
conversations_list.description: Lists all channels in a Slack team.

conversations_open.title: Opens or resumes a direct message or multi-person direct message.
conversations_open.description: Opens or resumes a direct message or multi-person direct message.

conversations_replies.title: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a conversation
conversations_replies.description: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a conversation

conversations_setPurpose.title: Sets the purpose for a conversation.
conversations_setPurpose.description: Sets the purpose for a conversation.

conversations_setTopic.title: Sets the topic for a conversation.
conversations_setTopic.description: Sets the topic for a conversation.

dialog_open.title: Open a dialog with a user
dialog_open.description: Open a dialog with a user

dnd_endDnd.title: Ends the current user's Do Not Disturb session immediately.
dnd_endDnd.description: Ends the current user's Do Not Disturb session immediately.

dnd_endSnooze.title: Ends the current user's snooze mode immediately.
dnd_endSnooze.description: Ends the current user's snooze mode immediately.

dnd_info.title: Retrieves a user's current Do Not Disturb status.
dnd_info.description: Retrieves a user's current Do Not Disturb status.

dnd_setSnooze.title: Turns on Do Not Disturb mode for the current user, or changes its duration.
dnd_setSnooze.description: Turns on Do Not Disturb mode for the current user, or changes its duration.

dnd_teamInfo.title: Retrieves the Do Not Disturb status for users on a team.
dnd_teamInfo.description: Retrieves the Do Not Disturb status for users on a team.

emoji_list.title: Lists custom emoji for a team.
emoji_list.description: Lists custom emoji for a team.

files_comments_add.title: Add a comment to an existing file.

groups_kick.description: Removes a user from a private channel.

oauth_access.description: Exchanges a temporary OAuth verifier code for an access token.

oauth_token.description: Exchanges a temporary OAuth verifier code for a workspace token.
